name: Mr. George Ominde
bio: A dedicated community leader with over 20 years in education governance. Passionate about infrastructure development and student welfare.

name: Mrs. Grace Achieng
bio: Advocate for gender equity and inclusive education. Leads the Discipline and Welfare Committee.

name: Rev. Peter Omondi
bio: Spiritual guide and liaison with the sponsoring African Inland Church. Oversees moral and spiritual programs.
